result.markdown:
--- title: "Controlled Vocabularies" format: html editor: visual --- ## üìö DFO Pacific Science Vocabularies This table lists machine-readable vocabularies curated by the Data Stewardship Unit to support standardization, integration, and automation across salmon-related research and management programs. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} # Manual index of vocabularies with live GitHub links vocab_index <- tribble( ~id, ~name, ~description, ~theme, ~last_updated, ~viewer_url, ~json, ~ttl, ~jsonld, "spsr", "SPSR Vocabulary", "Summary indices for fisheries stock assessment (FSARs)", "Stock Assessment", "2025-04-10", "https://dfo-pacific-science.github.io/data-stewardship-unit/data-standards/spsr-vocab-browser.html", "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dfo-pacific-science/data-stewardship-unit/refs/heads/main/data-standards/vocab/spsr_vocab.json", "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dfo-pacific-science/data-stewardship-unit/refs/heads/main/data-standards/vocab/spsr_vocab.ttl", "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dfo-pacific-science/data-stewardship-unit/refs/heads/main/data-standards/vocab/spsr_vocab.jsonld" ) vocab_index <- vocab_index %>% mutate( browser = paste0("[View](", viewer_url, ")"), json_link = paste0("[JSON](", json, ")"), ttl_link = paste0("[TTL](", ttl, ")"), jsonld_link = paste0("[JSON-LD](", jsonld, ")") ) datatable( vocab_index %>% select(name, theme, description, last_updated, browser, json_link, ttl_link, jsonld_link), options = list(pageLength = 10, scrollX = TRUE), rownames = FALSE, escape = FALSE, colnames = c("Name", "Theme", "Description", "Last Updated", "Viewer", "JSON", "TTL", "JSON-LD") ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ------------------------------------------------------------------------ ## üõ†Ô∏è TODOs for Improvement - [ ] Load vocab metadata from CSV or YAML instead of inline code - [ ] Add filters by theme or program - [ ] Include persistent w3id URIs once registered - [ ] Add stats (e.g., number of terms, match rate with SPSR) - [ ] Group vocabularies by domain (e.g., Stock Assessment, Monitoring, Habitat)
